My routine now is:
In shower (every three days):
1. Cowash with Trader Joe's Tea Tree Tingle, just the roots 2. Detangle with 1tbs Tresemme Undone Conditioner 3. Comb with a wide tooth comb 4. Flip hair upside down and S2C with ~2 tbs Tresemme Undone Conditioner
After shower:
1. Squish in ~1tbs Curls Hair Gel 2. Plop for 1hr-overnight (depending on what time of day I shower) 3. Diffuse using the pixie curl method
For second and third day hair:
1. Sleep with hair in a pineapple and a satin cap 2. In the morning, spray water (with a dollop of conditioner mixed in) on hair 3. Scrunch in water/conditioner 4. Air dry or diffuse depending on how wet I got my hair
